organizationId.description: ID of the organization that owns the key.

keyId.description: ID of the key to update.

roles.description: List of roles assigned to the key. Contains at least 1 element.

expireAt.description: Timestamp the key expires. If not present or is empty the key never expires. ISO-8601.

ipAccessList.description: List of IP addresses allowed to access the API using this key

description.description: Optional description of IPv4 address or IPv4 CIDR to allow access from
